text: 2014–15 Vijay Hazare Trophy was the 13th season of the Vijay Hazare Trophy, a List A cricket tournament in India. It was contested by 27 domestic cricket teams of India. Karnataka successfully defended the title after beating Punjab by 156 runs in the final. ==Format== The teams are divided across five zonal groups: Central Zone, East Zone, North Zone, South Zone and West Zone. The top two teams from Central Zone, East Zone and South Zone advance directly to the quarterfinals. The top two teams from each of North Zone and West Zone play in the pre-quarterfinals to determine which two teams advance to the quarterfinals. The winner of the knockout tree is declared winner of the tournament. ==Group stage== ===Central Zone=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center; width:65%" |- ! Teams !! Matches !!
